title: A simple (interactive) deduplication done with the xspf-tools
short: Use the xspf-tools as tool for finding duplicate files and handle them interactively
description: This bundle uses the batch feature to execute multiple chained commands (`batch`)
A new index file named "Index.xd" will be created from the current directory (`index:create`)
A duplicates listing file ("duplicates.txt") will be created from that index file (`duplicates:list`)
The interactive duplicate solving utility will be started (`duplicates:show`)
